author: dreiss
msg: THRIFT-928. cpp: TNonblockingServer: use TSocket and support TClientInfo
Modify TNonblockingServer to use TSocket for I/O and support server
event handlers; this enables TClientInfo to function with a minor change

author: dreiss
msg: THRIFT-926. cpp: Remove TServerSocket as a friend class of TSocket
This is no longer necessary now that TSocket::TSocket(int) is public.

author: dreiss
msg: THRIFT-924. php: Fix missing comma in generated PHP struct constants

author: dreiss
msg: THRIFT-926. cpp: Fix an errant argument to a debug statement
